players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. We should be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions during discussions and voting."
You: "I agree with Charlie - losing Diana so early is concerning. We need to work together carefully to identify who among us is the threat. Does anyone have any information that might help us?"

Bob: "I'd like to remind everyone that we lost a valuable member of our team last night. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a group during discussions and voting to ensure the safety of our remaining members."
You: "Bob, your comment about losing a 'valuable member of our team' seems oddly specific. How do you know Diana was valuable to our team specifically? That phrasing makes me suspicious of you."
Bob: "I apologize for any confusion earlier. I simply meant that losing any member of our team is unfortunate and we should all work together to ensure everyone's safety moving forward."
